definition.name: Azure Login
definition.description: Authenticate to Azure and run your Azure CLI or Azure PowerShell based actions or scripts.
definition.author: AndreasAugustin

inputs.name: creds
inputs.description: Paste output of `az ad sp create-for-rbac` as value of secret variable: AZURE_CREDENTIALS

inputs.name: client-id
inputs.description: ClientId of the Azure Service principal created.

inputs.name: tenant-id
inputs.description: TenantId of the Azure Service principal created.

inputs.name: enable-AzPSSession
inputs.description: Set this value to true to enable Azure PowerShell Login in addition to Azure CLI login

inputs.name: environment
inputs.description: Name of the environment. Supported values are azurecloud, azurestack, azureusgovernment, azurechinacloud, azuregermancloud. Default being azurecloud

inputs.name: allow-no-subscriptions
inputs.description: Set this value to true to enable support for accessing tenants without subscriptions

inputs.name: audience
inputs.description: Provide audience field for access-token. Default value is api://AzureADTokenExchange

inputs.name: auth-type
inputs.description: The type of authentication. Supported values are SERVICE_PRINCIPAL, IDENTITY. Default value is SERVICE_PRINCIPAL
